domain

Class DistanceAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.DistanceAccumulator

  • public class DistanceAccumulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class accumulates the distances for the given players using a random access binary file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.RandomAccessFile distances 
      private int numPlayers 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs an instance to accumulate distances for the given number of players using the fina named filename.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistanceAccumulator

        public DistanceAccumulator(int numPlayers,
                           java.lang.String filename)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs an instance to accumulate distances for the given number of players using the fina named filename. The numPlayers should be positive and the contents of the given file are erased. Valid players are numbered from 1 to numPlayers.
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - given number of players.
        filename - the anem of teh file to be used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • initDistances

        private void initDistances()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes an instance to accumulate distances for the number of players with distance where there values are zero.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeDistance

        private void writeDistance(int pos,
                           Distance distance)
                    throws java.io.IOException

      • hasAdvanced

        public void hasAdvanced(int numPlayer,
                        Distance distance)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the given distance to the accumulated total for the given player. The method ignores invalid numPlayer values.
        Parameters:
        numPlayer - the number of the player.
        distance - the distance advanced.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the file.

      • totalAdvanced

        public Distance totalAdvanced(int numPlayer)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the distance advanced by the player corresponding to this number. If an invalid numPlayer is given returns null.
        Parameters:
        numPlayer - the number of the player.
        Returns:
        the distance advanced by the player corresponding to this number or null if the numPlayer is not valid.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the file.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the underlying file used by the DistanceAccumulator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the file.

      • dump

        public void dump(java.io.PrintWriter writer)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Print on the given writer the contents of the file underlying file. ONLY for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        writer - where the info is printed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with the file.
